section.title: Overview
section.para: Total number of RINEX files collected for precessing ${AVAIL_RNX} out of ${V_RNX_TOT} (that should exist). Out of these : ${V_IGS_RNX} belong to the IGS network, ${V_EPN_RNX} belong to the EPN network, and ${V_REG_RNX} belong to the ${V_NETWORK} network

section.title: Available and Missing RINEX Files

row.entry:
Flag
This denotes the status of the processed station

Skyplot
Note that skyplots are only temporarily stored; normaly they are only kept for about ~30 days after the end of day of interest.

QC Report
Note that Quality Check (qc) file reports are only kept on the website for ~30 days. However, users can obtain them from NTUA's GSAC repository anytime.

section.para: Skyplots are created using the Generic Mapping Tools (gmt) Software
Quality Check for RINEX is performed via teqc, developed at UNAVCO.
